patterns: How do I find my schedule?
How do I locate my schedule?
Where can I see my schedule?
responses: You can easily find your schedule by logging into Moodle and navigating to the 'Schedule' section. If you need further assistance, please let me know.

patterns: Can you guide me in submitting assignments?
responses:
Watch the video to learn how to submit your assignment.
[Click here to watch the video.](https://tbcollege0.sharepoint.com/sites/ExternShare/_layouts/15/stream.aspx?id=%2Fsites%2FExternShare%2FShared%20Documents%2FMoodle%20Rise%20pages%2F5%2E%20E%2DLearning%20%26%20IT%20Support%2F2%2E%20E%2DLearning%2F3%2E%20How%20to%20submit%20My%20Assignment%2FHow%20to%20Submit%20Assignment%20%2Emp4&ga=1&referrer=StreamWebApp%2EWeb&referrerScenario=AddressBarCopied%2Eview)

patterns: How to find my teachers email?

responses:
